package.name: Horde_Icalendar
package.description: An API for dealing with iCalendar data.

release.notes: Initial release as a PEAR package
Lots of improvements, bugfixes and support for more fields and members of the iCalendar family.
* Converted to package.xml 2.0 for pear.horde.org.

* Fix vFreebusy merging (Bug #4807). * Implement handling of vTimezones in iCalendar data (lists-horde@carlthompson.net, Bug #4399). * Correctly produce vcard parameters without value, like "ADR;WORK:...". * Support departments in vCard's ORG properties (martin@matuska.org, Bug #4285). * Fixed _parseDateTime() (wrobel@pardus.de, Bug #4808). * Fix exporting of recurring exceptions (Bug #4627). * Use lowercase mailto: for better Apple iCal compatibility. * We must *not* escape colons per RFC in param values. * Fix encoding issues with iCalendar 2.0 exports. * Move version specific vCalendar/iCalendar export to Kronolith_Event. * Use QUOTED-PRINTABLE when there's a newline in VNOTE data. * Anniversary support (ntai@smartfruit.com, Request #5059). * Support for all day events with VCALENDAR 1.0. * Use ISO-8559-1 as default vCalendar 1.0 and vCard 2.1. * Fix unreliably overwriting a variable with itself (rsalmon@mbpgroup.com, Bug #5652). * Handle AALARM data with parameters (delimited by a ";"). * Fix GEO parsing and generation. * Refactor line folding and quoted-printable encoding. * Add missing softline break (Bug #6541). * Don't require a newline after END (Bug #6641, #6706). * Fix detecting of "old" formats when parsing vCalendar/vCard data. * Request charset on the fly, because it depends on the VERSION property. * Fix passing value arrays with only one element. * Correctly parse quoted parameters (Bug #7031) * Set the correct version if none provided through the vcard data. * BODY is not required, but N is, and FN for vcard3.0. * Return the passed address unmodified if Mail_RFC822::validateMailbox() fails. * Fixed importing of several events at once. * Removed required calendar component properties in vevent.php. * Fix generation of UIDs with PHP 5.2+. * Fix generation of free periods with overlapping events (cedric.parent@multitel.be). * Add support for extended vfreebusy parameters (wrobel@gentoo.org, Request #4690). * Ensure vnotes and vcards are created with a valid default version number.
* First alpha release for Horde 4.
* First beta release for Horde 4.
* First release candidate for Horde 4.
* Second release candidate for Horde 4.
* First stable release for Horde 4.
* [jan] Speed up exporting of objects with binary content (Bug #9405).
* [jan] Fix exporting multiline attributes to vCard 2.1 and vCalendar 1.0. * [jan] Update Latvian translation.
* [mjr] Fix fetching the version from an Icalendar object (Bug #10411).
* [mjr] Fix version access (Bug #10425). * [jan] Avoid infinite loop when importing certain vCalendar 1.0/vCard 2.1 data.
* [jan] Fix generating VTIMEZONE components.
* [jan] Allow to pass multiple parameter values in setAttribute() (Bug #7248).
* [jan] Fix compatibility with Horde_SyncMl (Bug #10908).
* [mms] Trim UTF-8 BOM from vCal data.
* First alpha release for Horde 5. * [mms] Use new Horde_Mail API.
* First beta release for Horde 5.
* [jan] Fix parsing of VTIMEZONE components that use RDATE properties.
* First stable release for Horde 5.
* [jan] Update Dutch translation (Arjen de Korte <build+horde@de-korte.org>).
* [jan] Update Basque translation (Ibon Igartua <ibon.igartua@ehu.es>).
* [jan] Don't set METHOD property unconditionally (Bug #10741). * [jan] Convert test suite to PHPUnit.
* [jan] Improve unit tests.
* [jan] Fix exporting of base64-encoded attribute values.
* [jan] Remove group identifiers from attribute types (Bug #12329).
* [jan] Fix generating DATE-TIME attributes with timezone information (Bug #12428). * [jan] Fix returning multiple attribute properties of the same name (Bug #12329).
* [jan] Export VTIMEZONE components only once per TZID (Bug #12988).
* [jan] Fix detecting the current DST rule from certain VTIMEZONE components (Bug #13223).
